subject: Capturing JUnit Reports from inside OC4J Container
msgSnippet: Hi. I have a servlet that runs JUnit testcases when OC4J is running, however I cannot get the JUnit reports that are otherwise created. Is there a way to
messageBody:
Hi.

I have a servlet that runs JUnit testcases when OC4J is running,
however I cannot get the JUnit reports that are otherwise created.

Is there a way to capture the JUnit reports from inside the OC4J
Conatiner. Do I have to define any prinwriter or set some property
while I am running the tests?

--thanks,
